class.name: com.cardiodx.db.waban.audit.AudSample
class.comment: Audit of information about samples that have been accessioned into the system.

column.name: CHANGE_REASON_ID
column.comment: Foreign key to the reason for change in change_reason table

column.name: SAMPLE_ID
column.comment: Sample identifier used by the lab.

column.name: SAMPLE_TUBE_ID
column.comment: The sample's tube identifier.

column.name: CLIENT_SAMPLE_TUBE_ID
column.comment: The sponsor's sample tube identifier.

column.name: ACCESSION_ID
column.comment: Accession identifier.

column.name: NUMBER_IN_ACC_SEQUENCE
column.comment: Display order in list.

column.name: CONTAINER_ID
column.comment: The container identifier for the container that holds the sample.

column.name: CONTAINER_ROW
column.comment: The sample's row location in its container.

column.name: CONTAINER_COLUMN
column.comment: The sample's column location in its container.

column.name: SAMPLE_CONDITION
column.comment: Sample condition (good, broken, etc.) as received from the sponsor.

column.name: SOURCE_TYPE
column.comment: What type of sample material is being accessioned (cells, whole blood, etc.).

column.name: INITIAL_VOLUME
column.comment: The amount of sample received from the sponsor.

column.name: DATE_RECEIVED
column.comment: Date the sample(s) were received in house.

column.name: DATE_PURIFIED
column.comment: Date the sample(s) were purified by the laboratory.

column.name: VOLUME
column.comment: Current sample amount.

column.name: CONCENTRATION
column.comment: The current sample concentration.

column.name: YIELD
column.comment: The sample yield ( (conc x vol)/1000 ).

column.name: FINAL_STORAGE_TUBE
column.comment: Flag for whether or not the sample is ready for final disposition.

column.name: SAMPLE_STATUS
column.comment: Status of the sample (discarded, empty, etc.).

column.name: SAMPLE_SHIPPED
column.comment: Date the sample was returned to the sponsor.

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.comment: User who created the record.

column.name: DATE_CREATED
column.comment: Date the record was created.

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.comment: User who last modified the record.

column.name: DATE_MODIFIED
column.comment: Date the record was last modified.

column.name: CHANGED_BY
column.comment: User who caused this audit transaction to take place.

column.name: DATE_CHANGED
column.comment: Date this audit transaction took place.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Activity that triggered this audit transaction (mod or del).
